articles.title: TMZ Sports Streaming Live From Newsroom, Join The Conversation!
articles.description: TMZ Sports is going live from the newsroom to discuss the day's biggest stories.
articles.content:

articles.title: Utah Tech's Chance Trujillo gets one-game suspension after punching Santa Clara opponent
articles.description: International Sports News: A basketball game between Utah Tech Trailblazers and Santa Clara Broncos saw a violent incident. Utah's Chance Trujillo punched opponent Allen Graves
articles.content: A basketball game between Utah Tech Trailblazers and Santa Clara Broncos saw a violent incident. Utah's Chance Trujillo punched opponent Allen Graves after a dunk. Trujillo has now received a one-game suspension. The altercation occurred in the final... [2352 chars]

articles.title: Fitness influencer Alessandro Antonicelli dies at 26 after raising cancer awareness during his final two years
articles.description: International Sports News: Italian fitness influencer Alessandro Antonicelli has passed away at 26 after a courageous battle with chondroblastic osteosarcoma. Known for his insp
articles.content: Italian fitness influencer Alessandro Antonicelli has passed away at 26 after a courageous battle with chondroblastic osteosarcoma. Known for his inspiring journey, he openly shared his fight, raising awareness and funds for cancer research. His stre... [3131 chars]

articles.title: Osasuna abre 2 a 0 sobre o Levante aos 37 minutos do primeiro tempo em Pamplona na LaLiga
articles.description: Osasuna constrói vantagem de 2 a 0 contra o Levante aos 37 minutos do primeiro tempo, no estádio El Sadar, em Pamplona. O placar foi aberto aos 13 minutos por Víctor Muñoz e ampliado aos 36 minutos por Ruben García. A partida segue em andamento pela 15ª rodada da LaLiga EA Sports 2025/2026. Os mandantes […]
articles.content: Osasuna constrói vantagem de 2 a 0 contra o Levante aos 37 minutos do primeiro tempo, no estádio El Sadar, em Pamplona. O placar foi aberto aos 13 minutos por Víctor Muñoz e ampliado aos 36 minutos por Ruben García. A partida segue em andamento pela ... [2416 chars]

articles.title: Heat’s Rozier pleads not guilty to sports betting charges
articles.description: Making an appearance in court Monday in New York, Miami Heat guard Terry Rozier pleaded not guilty to charges he helped gamblers placing bets on his performance in NBA games, and he and his lawyer, Jim Trusty, declined to comment after the brief hearing.
articles.content:
NEW YORK -- Miami Heat guard Terry Rozier pleaded not guilty Monday to charges he helped gamblers placing bets on his performance in NBA games.
The 31-year-old veteran of three NBA teams formally entered the plea during his arraignment in federal cou... [2602 chars]

articles.content:
WREXHAM, Wales (AP) — Wrexham’s celebrity owners have sold a minority stake in their on-the-rise soccer club to Apollo Sports Capital, a U.S.-based private equity firm.
The deal, which was announced on Monday with no terms disclosed, includes investm... [1467 chars]
